languages.text: "Меня призвало туда послание, шифрованное кодом благословенного Амарната. Оно было туманным и могло быть трактовано по разному. Но тот факт, что мы пребываем в опасности, и я должен прибыть на Райкад Минорис, был очевиден".

traits.locale_text: "Меня призвало туда послание. Его доставил в великой тайне {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервитор{/g}, не ведавший ни истинной важности отданного ему повеления, ни того, при каких обстоятельствах он его получил. Сообщение, шифрованное кодом благословенного Амарната, было туманным и могло быть трактовано по разному. Но тот факт, что мы пребываем в опасности, и я должен прибыть на Райкад Минорис, был очевиден".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."
languages.original_text: "Меня призвало туда послание, шифрованное кодом благословенного Амарната. Оно было туманным и могло быть трактовано по разному. Но тот факт, что мы пребываем в опасности, и я должен прибыть на Райкад Минорис, был очевиден".

traits.locale_text: "I was summoned there by a message. It was delivered in great secrecy by a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g} that knew nothing about the true importance of that command or the circumstances of him receiving it. The message was encrypted with blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. Once thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to arrive at Rykad Minoris."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was summoned there by a message. It was delivered in great secrecy by a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g} that knew nothing about the true importance of that command or the circumstances of him receiving it. The message was encrypted with blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. Once thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to arrive at Rykad Minoris."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was summoned there by a message. It was delivered in great secrecy by a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g} that knew nothing about the true importance of the order or the circumstances under which the order was received. The message was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was summoned there by a message. It was delivered in great secrecy by a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g} that knew nothing about the true importance of the order or the circumstances under which the order was received. The message was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «He sido convocado aquí por un mensaje codificado con la cifra personal del bendito Amarnat que podía interpretarse de diversas maneras. Una cosa estaba clara: estábamos en peligro y tenía que acudir a Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: «He sido convocado aquí por un mensaje codificado con la cifra personal del bendito Amarnat que podía interpretarse de diversas maneras. Una cosa estaba clara: estábamos en peligro y tenía que acudir a Rykad Minoris».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「祝福されしアマルナトの個人コードで暗号化され、さまざまな形に解釈できるメッセージによって召還された。ひとつだけ明らかなことがあった。我々は危機に陥っており、私はライカド・ミノリスに行かねばならなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福されしアマルナトの個人コードで暗号化され、さまざまな形に解釈できるメッセージによって召還された。ひとつだけ明らかなことがあった。我々は危機に陥っており、私はライカド・ミノリスに行かねばならなかったのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “当时，是蒙福者阿玛纳特通过个人代码加密的信息，将我召唤到了那里。那条信息可能会有多种解释，但有件事情是肯定的：我们当时正处于危险之中，而我必须去小莱卡德。”
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: “当时，是蒙福者阿玛纳特通过个人代码加密的信息，将我召唤到了那里。那条信息可能会有多种解释，但有件事情是肯定的：我们当时正处于危险之中，而我必须去小莱卡德。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai reçu un message m'y convoquant, un message crypté par le code personnel du bienheureux Amarnat et pouvant être interprété de différentes manières. Une chose était sûre, cependant : nous étions en danger et je devais gagner Rykad Minoris. »
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai reçu un message m'y convoquant, un message crypté par le code personnel du bienheureux Amarnat et pouvant être interprété de différentes manières. Une chose était sûre, cependant : nous étions en danger et je devais gagner Rykad Minoris. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wurde von einer Nachricht dorthin gerufen, die mit dem persönlichen Code des gesegneten Amarnat verschlüsselt war und sich auf verschiedene Arten interpretieren ließ. Eines war sicher: Wir waren in Gefahr und ich musste nach Rykad Minoris reisen."
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde von einer Nachricht dorthin gerufen, die mit dem persönlichen Code des gesegneten Amarnat verschlüsselt war und sich auf verschiedene Arten interpretieren ließ. Eines war sicher: Wir waren in Gefahr und ich musste nach Rykad Minoris reisen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın kişisel koduyla şifrelenmiş ve birden fazla şekilde yorumlanabilecek bir mesaj ile oraya çağrıldım. Kesin olan tek bir şey vardı: Tehlike altındaydık ve Rykad Minoris'e gitmem gerekiyordu."
languages.original_text: "I was summoned there by a message that was encrypted with the blessed Amarnat's personal code and could be interpreted in several ways. One thing was certain: we were in danger and I had to go to Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın kişisel koduyla şifrelenmiş ve birden fazla şekilde yorumlanabilecek bir mesaj ile oraya çağrıldım. Kesin olan tek bir şey vardı: Tehlike altındaydık ve Rykad Minoris'e gitmem gerekiyordu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
